body:
=== SYSTEM DIRECTIVE: ADOPT EXISTING REPOSITORY ===
Command: octeams adopt https://github.com/schoolofai/verify-adopt-test.git
Product: verify-adopt-test
Mode: Existing codebase — analyze, strategize, staff, grow

CONTEXT: This repo has been cloned and scaffolded with .team/ infrastructure.
Read .team/conventions.md for the codebase analysis.

EXECUTE THESE STEPS IN ORDER:
1. ANALYZE    — Read codebase structure and .team/conventions.md
2. ACKNOWLEDGE — Confirm analysis, transition phase: setup → discovery
3. ASSESS     — Architecture, tech debt, market positioning
4. STRATEGY   — GTM strategy for existing product → /work/deliverables/gtm-strategy.md
5. PREFLIGHT  — Pre-flight checklist → /work/deliverables/preflight-checklist.md
6. PROPOSE    — Team composition → MUST write .team/team-proposal.json
7. READY ACK  — Send completion message to human inbox using host cycle format

For this host lifecycle cycle, execute steps 1-7 in ONE uninterrupted pass.
Do NOT pause waiting for intermediate CEO review before sending READY ACK.

*** CRITICAL REQUIREMENT ***
Step 6 MUST create .team/team-proposal.json matching this EXACT schema:
{
  "status": "proposed",
  "proposed_at": "2026-01-01T00:00:00.000Z",
  "rationale": "Why this team composition was chosen...",
  "roles": [
    {
      "role": "developer",
      "count": 1,
      "description": "Core backend API development",
      "soul_md": "# Developer Agent\n\nYou are a backend developer..."
    },
    {
      "role": "qa",
      "count": 1,
      "description": "Testing and quality assurance",
      "soul_md": "# QA Agent\n\nYou are a QA engineer..."
    }
  ],
  "prerequisites": {
    "blocking": ["GitHub repository access"],
    "before_launch": ["Hosting", "Domain"],
    "nice_to_have": ["Analytics"]
  }
}

REQUIRED FIELDS (the CLI validates with Zod — wrong field names will FAIL):
- "status": "proposed", "proposed_at": ISO timestamp, "rationale": string
- "roles": array with "role", "count", "description", "soul_md" (min 50 chars)
- DO NOT use "team", "proposal_date", "agent_id", "focus", "skills"
After writing required artifacts, commit and push them to mirror:
- git add /work/deliverables/gtm-strategy.md /work/deliverables/preflight-checklist.md
- git add .team/team-proposal.json .team/phase.json .team/comms/ .team/activity/ .team/roster/
- git commit && git push origin main

YOU DO NOT SPIN UP AGENTS OR ASSEMBLE THE TEAM.
The host CLI performs review, approval, and assembly.
Your ONLY job is to write deliverables + proposal and send READY ack.

READY ACK MUST include:
- type=proposal_ready
- cycle_id=<value provided by host in cycle contract>
- summary=<short artifact summary>
Send READY ACK using octeams msg (do NOT edit inbox JSONL files directly).
*** END CRITICAL ***
=== END DIRECTIVE ===

=== HOST REVIEW CYCLE CONTRACT ===
cycle_id=adopt:verify-adopt-test:2026-02-21T23:30:26.183Z:abc4c276
mode=adopt

When all required deliverables and team proposal are ready:
1. Send a message to human inbox that includes:
   - type=proposal_ready
   - cycle_id=adopt:verify-adopt-test:2026-02-21T23:30:26.183Z:abc4c276
   - short summary of produced artifacts
2. Keep proposal status as "proposed" until host approval.
3. READY ack is allowed only after required deliverables + proposal for this exact cycle_id are regenerated, committed, and pushed together.
4. Never send READY if proposal refreshed but any required deliverable is stale from a prior cycle.

READY ACK FORMAT (copy exactly):
type=proposal_ready
cycle_id=adopt:verify-adopt-test:2026-02-21T23:30:26.183Z:abc4c276
summary=<artifact summary>
Send this via octeams msg to human inbox. Never write raw lines directly to JSONL files.
=== END HOST REVIEW CYCLE CONTRACT ===

=== SYSTEM NOTIFICATION: TEAM ASSEMBLED ===
The CEO has approved your team proposal.
The octeams CLI has:
  1. Accepted team-proposal.json (status → "accepted")
  2. Written SOUL.md files for each role
  3. Started all agent containers
  4. Agents are registering in the roster

ACTION REQUIRED:
- Transition to the PLANNING phase
- Decompose the product spec into tasks on the board (.team/board/)
- Assign tasks to team members based on their roles
- The team is ready and waiting for work
=== END NOTIFICATION ===
